name: license-check
description: npm module to check the presence of a specific header in all the files of a project. the plugin give to you a log of all the files where the header is missing. never miss again a license header in a file.
kwds: npm module to check the presence of a specific header in all the files of a project. the plugin give to you a log of all the files where the header is missing. never miss again a license header in a file. check license header
